text: taṅṅaḷuṭe śapathaṅṅaḷ laṅghikkukayuṁ, ṟasūline puṟattākkān mutirukayuṁ ceyta oru janavibhāgattēāṭ niṅṅaḷ yud'dhaṁ ceyyunnillē? avarāṇallēā niṅṅaḷēāṭ ādyatavaṇa (yud'dhaṁ) tuṭaṅṅiyat‌. avare niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭukayāṇēā? ennāl niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭān ēṟṟavuṁ arhatayuḷḷat allāhuveyāṇ‌; niṅṅaḷ viśvāsikaḷāṇeṅkil
